Item.Name: Bootstrap
Item.Description: Bootstrap is an HTML, CSS and JS Framework for designing responsive and beautiful applications

Item.Name: JQuery
Item.Description: jQuery is a multi-browser (cf. cross-browser) JavaScript library designed to simplify the client-side scripting of HTML.

Item.Name: JQueryUI
Item.Description: jQuery UI is a curated set of user interface interactions, effects, widgets, and themes built on top of the jQuery JavaScript Library.
